alert.note: Alert for La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Joseph, northeastern La Porte and Berrien Counties through 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/... At 808 PM EDT/708 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Carlisle, or 7 miles west of South Bend, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buchanan around 820 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Berrien Springs, Fair Plain, Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Benton Heights, Watervliet, Coloma, Lake Michigan Beach and Paw Paw Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 196 between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 62 and 77. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 21 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
